overview.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
overview.subtitle: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js. Cloud-native systems, distributed platforms, and real-time pipelines for scalable SaaS and healthcare.

about.p1: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 15+ years of experience building scalable SaaS, healthcare, and IoT platforms. I have a proven track record delivering cloud-native systems serving 100K+ users and real-time pipelines processing millions of events monthly.
about.p2: Strong ownership mindset with deep experience in microservices, performance optimization, and cross-functional delivery. I focus on improving reliability, reducing latency, and mentoring engineers in fast-paced product teams. Core strengths: distributed systems, real-time platforms, cloud architecture, and end-to-end ownership.

contact.title: Contact.
contact.body: Tell me about your project, goals, or how I can help. I will respond within 1-2 business days.

form.messagePlaceholder: What do you want to say?
form.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent.
form.error: Please fill out all fields and try again.

bullets: Led architecture and development of multi-tenant IoT SaaS platform serving 150K+ users
Improved dashboard performance by 38% via React and API optimization
Designed distributed microservices processing millions of device events monthly
Reduced AWS infrastructure costs by 25% through container and service optimization
Delivered 20+ customer-facing features in collaboration with product and design
Mentored engineers and established code quality standards
Contributed to system design decisions shaping platform scalability roadmap
Built clinical trial platform supporting 50K+ research participants
Improved task completion by 31% through UX modernization
Reduced API response time by 45% via query optimization
Implemented automated testing reducing production bugs 40%
Helped maintain HIPAA-aligned secure data workflows
Led full-stack development for multiple client engagements
Improved application load times by up to 50%
Designed backend services for high-volume workflows
Mentored junior developers
Worked directly with business stakeholders
Built responsive web apps for SMB clients
Created reusable components improving delivery speed 30%
Implemented REST endpoints and business logic
Supported development of client web apps
Fixed legacy defects and improved UI consistency
Assisted with database maintenance and SQL queries

zetabarber-platform.title: ZetaBarber
zetabarber-platform.description: Discovery and booking platform for local barbers built with Next.js and Node.js, using shadcn/ui and React Hooks for a fast, responsive UX.

warmly-ai-gtm.title: Warmly AI GTM Platform
warmly-ai-gtm.description: AI-native GTM platform built with React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, integrating AI/LLM services with a .NET Core backend.

gmelius-email-collaboration.title: Gmelius
gmelius-email-collaboration.description: AI email assistant and shared inbox suite built with React on AWS, backed by .NET Core services.
